definitions: The action of indicating a direction, object, or person with a finger or other object.
The action of aiming something, especially a weapon, in a particular direction.
The action of filling the joints of brickwork or masonry with mortar.
The action of directing attention to something.
examples: She was pointing at the map.
He was pointing the camera at the bird.
The bricklayer was pointing the new wall.
The evidence was pointing to a single suspect.
